mapper.select: /*안전점검 등록 시설 목록 조회(전체)*/ SELECT c.safety_check_cd as safetyCheckCd ,c.user_id as userId ,u.user_nm as userName ,f.facility_nm as facilityNm ,c.safety_check_file as safetyCheckFile ,c.safety_check_date as safetyCheckDate ,c.safety_check_reg_date as safetyCheckRegDate FROM safety_check AS c, user AS u, facility AS f WHERE c.user_id = u.user_id AND u.user_id = f.user_id AND c.facility_cd = f.facility_cd LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage};

/*시설 관리자의 안전점검 등록 목록 조회*/ SELECT c.user_id as userId ,c.safety_check_cd as safetyCheckCd ,f.facility_nm as facilityNm ,c.safety_check_file as safetyCheckFile ,c.safety_check_date as safetyCheckDate ,c.safety_check_reg_date as safetyCheckRegDate FROM safety_check AS c INNER JOIN facility AS f ON c.facility_cd = f.facility_cd WHERE c.user_id = #{session.SID};

/*안전점검 등록코드별 시설 수정*/ SELECT c.safety_check_cd ,c.user_id ,c.facility_cd ,c.safety_check_file ,c.safety_check_date ,c.safety_check_reg_date ,c.safety_check_state FROM safety_check AS c WHERE c.safety_check_cd = #{safetyCheckCd};
mapper.update:

UPDATE safety_check SET safety_check_date = #{safetyCheckDate}, safety_check_reg_date = NOW() WHERE safety_check_cd = #{safetyCheckCd};
mapper.select: /*관리자의 안전점검 결과 목록 조회(전체)*/ SELECT c.user_id as userId ,u.user_nm as userName ,f.facility_nm as facilityNm ,r.safety_check_result as safetyCheckResult ,r.safety_result_reg_date as safetyResultRegDate FROM safety_check AS c, user AS u, facility AS f, safety_result AS r WHERE c.user_id = u.user_id AND u.user_id = f.user_id AND c.facility_cd = f.facility_cd AND c.safety_check_cd = r.safety_check_cd LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage};

/*시설 관리자의 안전점검 결과 목록 조회*/ SELECT f.facility_nm as facilityNm ,r.safety_check_result as safetyCheckResult ,r.safety_result_reg_date as safetyResultRegDate FROM safety_check AS c INNER JOIN facility AS f ON c.facility_cd = f.facility_cd INNER JOIN safety_result AS r ON r.safety_check_cd = c.safety_check_cd WHERE c.user_id = #{session.SID};
